name: COUNCIL OF CATALAN CHAMBERS OF COMMERCE
goal: GCCC is a regional Spanish Chamber of Commerce established under the law 14/2002, of June 27th, aiming at coordinating the activity of all 13 Catalan Chambers and to guarantee the joint dialogue with the main institutions of the country. It coordinates the activities of internationalization and other programs, proposing measures and actions for the promotion and the defence of the economic general interest of industry and commerce.
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Competence and International Trade
Industry and environment regulations
Circular Economy
Vocational Training Apprenticeships
Innovation
Entrepreneurship
